definitions.definition: Any member of certain classes of devices that hoist things.
The act of hoisting; a lift .
examples: Give me a hoist over that wall.

definitions.definition: The triangular vertical position of a flag , as opposed to the flying state, or triangular vertical position of a sail , when flying from a mast .
The position of a flag (on a mast ) or of a sail on a ship when lifted up to its highest level .
The position of a main fore-and-aft topsail on a ship and fore fore-and-aft topsail on a ship .

main_definition: Any member of certain classes of devices that hoist things.
secondary_definitions: The act of hoisting; a lift .
The triangular vertical position of a flag , as opposed to the flying state, or triangular vertical position of a sail , when flying from a mast .
The position of a flag (on a mast ) or of a sail on a ship when lifted up to its highest level .
The position of a main fore-and-aft topsail on a ship and fore fore-and-aft topsail on a ship .
